short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SpeakIt4U extension converts entered text into speech.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension will update your search settings and will change your new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing.

You will also be able to convert entered text into speech at your convenience, directly from the new tab!

By clicking "add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the SpeakIt4U extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://speakit4u.com/terms.html and Privacy Policy https://www.speakit4u.com/policy.html

Uninstall Instructions: https://www.speakit4u.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.speakit4u.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.speakit4u.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.speakit4u.com/terms.html#terms-contact

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
